::Hot Rod::

He looked into Feline's eyes, as he sipped his drink. She was beutiful,
but there was something about her, something dark. He desmissed the
thought.
"So tell me about yourself." He thought a sec.
"I dont even know your name."

::DrillBit::

"Phobia! Her life signes are failing, she's dieing!"
He crateled her in his arms.
"Dont you die! You cant! Come on, your stronger then this, fight, fight
for your life, my love! There is still something I want to say to you."
He put her down, and started doing what he could, to save her.
